name: Undead
description: A lich beckons souls of the dead. This card can point to anything that refuses to die, from old grudges and unresolved issues to Undead creatures.

person.upright: A person nursing a grudge beyond reason.
person.reverse: A person too quick to forgive and forget, who never holds anyone accountable for their misdeeds.

creatureTrap.upright: An Undead creature sustained by a thirst for revenge or an unfinished task, such as a ghost or revenant.
creatureTrap.reverse: An Undead creature that craves an end to its miserable, interminable existence.

place.upright: A place haunted (literally or emotionally) by a terrible event that happened there.
place.reverse: A place whose denizens have forgotten significant events that happened there.

treasure.upright: A treasure depicting the dead or an Undead, something made from bones, or a magic item made by or for an Undead.
treasure.reverse: An art object depicting the destruction of an Undead, or a magic item particularly useful against Undead (such as a Mace of Disruption).

situation.upright: Someone who refuses to leave the past in the past.
situation.reverse: A serial criminal who has been pardoned for past misdeeds and now continues their wicked ways.
